thread.title: Royals fans snatching up AL Champs gear left and right
thread.title_full: Royals fans snatching up AL Champs gear left and right - KCTV5

author: Laura McCallister, Multimedia Producer
title: Royals fans snatching up AL Champs gear left and right
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - If you are a Kansas City Royals fan wanting to help the team celebrate being 2015 American League Champions, there are a number of options to choose from to get your gear.
Aramark, the team’s official retail partner, is now selling 2015 AL Champions gear in the Majestic Team Store at Kauffman Stadium.
The Majestic Team Store will also be open 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Saturday and 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. on Sunday before and during the Kansas City Chiefs game for people to buy AL Champions apparel, headwear and novelty items for the whole family.
Fans can celebrate the championship by purchasing the official “Locker Room” t-shirt and hat the players received after the game at the Majestic Team Store located behind the Kia Diamond Club. There will also be plenty of other items for fans to choose from, including exclusive Under Armour items that will only be available for purchase at Kauffman Stadium.
Dick's Sporting Goods is also offering up postseason gear. Their stores stayed open late on Friday and opened early Saturday.
